title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When creating several report parameters and setting default values for them, the default values are not displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
OB: When I create multiple report parameters and set default values for them, the default values are not visible in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
EB: The default values set for report parameters should be displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for the report parameters.
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout section.
4. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
5. Verify that the default values are not shown in the dialog.
